p: The chemical constituents of EECP were measured by HPLC-DAD/Q-TOF-MS analysis, and a total of 16 constituents were identified and quantified ( Table 2). Flavonoids such as chrysin, pinocembrin, pinobanksin, apigenin, galangin, and quercin were rich in EECP, and previous studies also showed that these compounds have excellent antitumor activities [ 21â€“ 25].
